headline: Allegion (ALLE) Beats Q3 Earnings and Revenue Estimates
summary: Allegion (ALLE) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +4.07% and +3.33%, respectively, for the quarter ended September 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

raw.headline: Allegion (ALLE) Beats Q3 Earnings and Revenue Estimates

headline: Allegion’s (NYSE:ALLE) Q3 Sales Beat Estimates
summary: Security hardware provider Allegion (NYSE:ALLE) reported Q3 CY2025 results topping the market’s revenue expectations, with sales up 10.7% year on year to $1.07 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $2.30 per share was 2.5% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

raw.headline: Allegion’s (NYSE:ALLE) Q3 Sales Beat Estimates
raw.summary: Security hardware provider Allegion (NYSE:ALLE) reported Q3 CY2025 results topping the market’s revenue expectations, with sales up 10.7% year on year to $1.07 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $2.30 per share was 2.5% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Allegion: Q3 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The results surpassed Wall Street expectations. The average estimate of four analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of $2.21 per share. The security device maker posted revenue of $1.07 billion in the period, also topping Street forecasts.

headline: Allegion (NYSE: ALLE) Reports Q3-2025 Financial Results
summary: DUBLIN, October 23, 2025--Allegion plc (NYSE: ALLE), a leading global security products and solutions provider, today reported financial results for its third quarter (ended Sept. 30, 2025).
